import React, { useRef } from 'react'; import emailjs from '@emailjs/browser'; import "./contact.css"; const Contact = () => { const form = useRef(); const sendEmail = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // Send email using EmailJS emailjs .sendForm( 'service_u8pmf6e', // Your EmailJS Service ID 'template_l0z81v4', // Your EmailJS Template ID form.current, 'oPZwqKv6RKVDb69f_' // Your EmailJS Public Key ) .then( (result) => { alert('Email sent successfully!'); console.log('Email sent:', result.text); }, (error) => { alert('Failed to send email. Please try again later.'); console.error('Error sending email:', error.text); } ); // Reset the form fields e.target.reset(); }; return (
